long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Metaplane ensures everyone trusts the data that powers your business. Data teams at Bose, ClickUp, Klaviyo, and more use our data observability platform to prevent and detect data issues—before the CEO pings them about weird revenue numbers.

We do this with ML-based anomaly detection, end-to-end column-level lineage, and tools to help prevent incidents before they occur. You can monitor your entire data stack within 30 minutes. 

Using the Metaplane Chrome extension while looking at any of your business intelligence dashboards allows you to:
1️⃣ Confirm the integrity of source data being referenced in your dashboard
2️⃣ Check if you’re looking at the most up-to-date data
3️⃣ Understand how your data flows through your data stack prior to reaching your dashboard 
4️⃣ Ensure data engineers, analytics engineers, and analysts are all on the same page regarding your company’s data quality

And if you want to learn more about what the Chrome extension does, book time with the Metaplane team here: https://www.metaplane.dev/book-a-demo 

If you don’t currently have a Metaplane account, you can sign up for free here: https://metaplane.dev/signup
